## Featured

### Rent vs Shelter Population in NYC (VAR)
Time-series analysis of how NYC median asking rent and shelter population co-move over time, using a VAR method with forecasting.
[View project →](projects/rent_shelter_var.Rmd)

### The Impact of Refugees on House Prices in European Countries (TWFE)
Two-way fixed effects analysis linking refugee inflows to housing price dynamics across European countries, with spatial/econometric extensions.
[View project →](projects/Refugees_EU.Rmd)

### Fertility Rate Forecast (ARCH/GARCH)
Volatility-aware forecasting of fertility-rate dynamics using ARCH/GARCH-style time-series modeling.
[View project →](projects/fert_rate.Rmd)
